Home About Blog

Vimwiki

VimWiki

Wiki Management

  1. [number] ww : open wiki index file
  2. [nubeer] wt : open wiki index file in new tab
  3. ws : list and select avaliable wikis
  4. wd : delete wiki page
  5. wr : rename wiki page

Diary Management

  1. [number] wi : open diary index file for wiki
  2. w i : update current diary index
  3. [number] w w : open today's diary file for wiki
  4. [number] w t : open today's diary file for wiki in new tab
  5. : open previous day's diary
  6. : open next day's diary

Navigation

  1. : follow/create wiki link
  2. : follow/create wiki link in new tab
  3. : go back to previous wiki page
  4. : go to next link on current page
  5. : go to previous link on current page

Editing shortcuts

  1. : toggle list item on/off
  2. = : add header level
  3. - : remove header level
  4. + : create/decoate links
  5. glm : increase indent of list item
  6. gll : decrease indent of list item
  7. gl* : or gl8 switch or insert “*” symbol
  8. gl# : or gl3 switch or insert “#” symbol
  9. gl- : switch or insert “-“ symbol
  10. gl1 : switch or insert “1.” symbol

Table Shortcuts

  1. : move column left
  2. : move column right
  3. : (insert mode) go down/create cell
  4. : (insert mode) go next/ create cell
  5. gqq or gww : reformat table

Text Objects

  1. ah : section between 2 headings including empty tralling lines
  2. ih : section between 2 headings excluding empty tralling lines
  3. a\ : table cell
  4. i\ inner table cell
  5. ac : table column
  6. ic : inner table column
